pageProduct.name: Allens Retro Party Mix 190g
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Allen's Retro Party Mix combines the perfect mix with a popular favourite for everyone. Join in the fun with funny teeth, tangy pineapples, green racing cars, juicy strawberries and cream, creamy milk bottles, chewy raspberries, luscious lips, honey bears, cool cola bottles and retro man. Australian made and contain no artificial colours, so are great to share with family and friends. Contains Wheat. May contain Milk. Allen's makes smiles!

Directions

Store in a cool and dry place.
